text:
Eye Of Harmony:
The Eye Of Harmony can be used as the power source of the TARDIS, in order for this to happen, it must be placed inside the TARDIS, and it must be activated, in order to activate it, you must have a nether star in your hand, and click the EOH block, then with an empty hand, click the block again, the EOH should be activated and your TARDIS Should have unlimited power
